resources.string: Whats life without you...Hmm Tejaswini (aka Tez) I would say its incomplete. You are now basically a part of me. You complete me. So here is something i have for you. Below are 3 buttons,Each of which has a special message for you. Each button along with the message has a task which you have to complete, and i expect you to do,love. You must select the buttons sequence wise,else yeah you will mess up with the tasks. Trust me you will love it.
IT ALL BEGINS HERE AM BUTTON 1
AM BUTTON 2,DEAR PLEASE TAP BUTTON 1 THEN TOUCH ME
I KNOW AM SEXY,STILL BUTTON 1 AND 2 ARE IMPORTANT,AM AFTER THEM. AM BUTTON 3

Hello there....i welcome you...hmm so its the beggining right. Great so lets begin, So it all began on May 1st no you didnt say me yes..lol its the day we talked over the phone for 1st time.....So actually it all began on May 13th, yeah you said yes,luckiest day of my life. I literally have no words for you,literally nothing,because my feelings for you are inexpressible. Every moment i spend with you, every moment i talk with you is like a beautiful dream come true. My life is a heaven in your presence. Wanna hear more hmm...complete the below task......below is a button,which contains an insta account of a person,what you are supposed to do is STALK him yeah..i mean it

So,Here you are...stalked him right....great. So, how much do i love you? Hmm the answer to this question lies in the statement I love you 3000. You know how much this line means to me and how much i love you. For me you are the most beautiful person. Mere saare dukh, dard door hojate hain aapke saath baat karke. AAP KI KHOOBSURATI ITNI HAI KI CHAAND AAPKO DEKHKE SHARMA JAYE, AAG AAPKO DEKHKE KHUD SE HI JAAL JAYE..... Now,whatever you feel for me now....presently anything just click the button below and send me your feelings.....

So, I really loved your message...So we are in the final stage. Nothing much to say i already said it...my feelings are damn inexpressible. You are my best friend,my soulmate,my companion,my gf, you are a part of me now. I love you dear..If i am a body you are my soul.... Humesha mete saath rehena...and i remember one thing am always with you,and yes another thing i am probably the 1st Bf in this world to make an app for his Gf ... i love you 3000 So your final task tap the button below call him and say how do you feel now..
